translations: n.(Mongol) 蒙古族人，蒙古人；蒙古语
adj.(Mongol) 蒙古人的；蒙古语的

sentences.sentence: Most Mongolians are Mongol in descent.
sentences.translation: 大多数蒙古人在血统上都缘于蒙古（Mongol）。

sentences.sentence: By 1206, all the Mongol tribes were ready to recognize him as supreme leader.
sentences.translation: 到1206年，蒙古各部落都愿意认定他为最高统领。

sentences.sentence: In the meantime, a Mongol enemy put his 12-year-old brother on the throne in Fergana.
sentences.translation: 在此期间，一个蒙古人把他12岁的弟弟扶上了他在费尔干纳的王座。
